ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm...then it s different than the one my bard has... my Order of Thunder is NoDrop, Lore, Magic...AC2, cha +5... can t be given away have they changed this?
ygData.messageBody:
hmm...then it's different than the one my bard has...

my Order of Thunder is NoDrop, Lore, Magic...AC2, cha +5...
can't be given away

have they changed this?

MacGrough Mich'Rathe - 23rd Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

p.s. it's part of an evil quest for SK's(?) in the Qeynos Sewers, or at
least, it used to be...careful down in the sewers...good races are KOS in
the SK area...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 5:13 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor


> A Troll warrior gave me one of these in WK several
> weeks ago. I was maybe lvl 15 at the time and really
> happy to get it. He said he looted it and didn't want
> it. I didn't ask at the time. Wish I had now.
>
>
> --- "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...> wrote:
> > It is AC 2 Cha +5 but the last time I went looking
> > for Drosco, he no
> > longer spawns where he once did. He is not an
> > unnnamed zombie that spawns
> > somewhere else entire :(
> >
> > My enchanter still wears hers. But... I have no clue
> > where to get it now :(
> >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
> > >Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 1:22 PM
> >
> > >There is a magic necklace that is a good item for
> > low to mid level bards
> > >that is fairly easy to acquire solo. Its called
> > the Order of Thunder (no
> > >drop) and is found off a named zombie in the Qeynos
> > aqueducts. Its been a
> > >while since I wore it (got a Cape of the Midnight
> > Mist now) but IIRC one of
> > >the bonuses is +5 charisma. It also has a small AC
> > boost as well as
> > >function as a light source. Check out a spoiler
> > site if you want to know
> > >all the stats on it.
> > >
> > >Galtin of E'ci
> >
> >
>
>
